entry.title: Sri Radha Ashtmi
entry.content:
All glories to Shri Shri Guru and Gauranga.
All glories to Shri Shri Radha Govindji.

Hare Krishna.

❤️ Sri Radha Ashtami — Sunday, Aug 31

Sri Govindji Gaudiya Math warmly invites you to our most glorious and auspicious festival of the year.

Time: 11:00 AM – 1:00 PM

Significance:
We celebrate the divine appearance of Sri Radha Rani, the eternal shakti of Lord Sri Krishna.

Program Highlights

  • Ecstatic kirtan
  • Janam-lila katha
  • Maha arati
  • Maha-prasadam will be served

This is a deeply devotional day to honor Sri Radha Rani, the divine potency of Lord Krishna. Come with your family and receive blessings on this auspicious occasion.

Sponsorship & Info:
Call 832-464-4686 or visit sggm.org.

🌹 Special Note:
Anyone is welcome to bring a basket (chaav) of shringar items—bangles, bindi, perfume, sindoor, and chunris—as well as fruits, dry fruits, and dry sweets to offer to Srimati Radhika Rani. All prasadam will be distributed after the offering.

Sri Govindji Gaudiya Matha
16628 Kieth Harrow Blvd.
Houston, TX 77084
📞 (832) 464-4686
www.sggm.org

Please invite everyone, spread the word, and share this message widely.

Haribol.

entry.title: Three Big Celebrations
entry.content:
All glories to Shri Shri Guru and Gauranga.
All glories to Shri Shri Radha Govindji.

Hare Krishna.

🌟 Shri Krishna Janmashtami Celebration 🌟

Hosted by Shri Govindaji Gaudiya Math

With great joy and devotion, we invite you and your loved ones to join us in celebrating the divine appearance day of Lord Shri Krishna.

🗓️ Date: August 16
🕖 Time: 7:00 PM to Midnight
📍 Location: Shri Govindaji Gaudiya Math
🙏 Founder-Acharya: Srila Bhaktivedanta Narayan Goswami Maharaj

✨ Highlights of the Evening:

  • Soul-stirring Katha
  • Blissful Kirtan
  • Heart-melting Abhishek
  • Ecstatic Cultural Performances
  • Grand Midnight Maha Arati
  • Followed by delicious Mahaprasad

You’ll also have the opportunity to offer your own puja thali to the Lord.

🕉️ Don’t Miss This Divine Occasion!

This is a once-a-year chance to celebrate the birth of Lord Shri Krishna in a spiritually uplifting environment.

Bring your family, friends, and neighbors—all are welcome!
